detectors.description:

	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Issued(recipient,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Issuance.sol#511)

detectors.description:
Low level call in Address.sendValue(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Issuance.sol#387-393):

owner() should be declared external:

renounceOwnership() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.renounceOwnership() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Issuance.sol#164-167)

transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Issuance.sol#173-177)

issue(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Issuance.issue(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Issuance.sol#498-512)
